description:
Dashboard for Spring Boot2 Statistics(by micrometer-prometheus).
This is a fork of dashboard 6756, fixed for Spring Boot 2.3 and support for Jetty instead of Tomcat along with scraping endpoints' metrics.

targets.expr:
sum(irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{exported_instance="$instance", application="$application", status!~"^2.*"} [1m]) ) by (status)/ ignoring(status)   group_left()
sum(irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{exported_instance="$instance", application="$application" } [1m]))

irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{exported_instance="$instance", application="$application", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[5m]) / irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{exported_instance="$instance", application="$application", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[5m])

title: Spring Boot Statistics & Endpoint Metrics-14430
